___workerCount.description: Number of instances in the worker pool.

___workerSizeId.description: Worker size ID for referencing this worker pool.

___workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances.

___name.description: The name of this route. This is only returned by the server and does not need to be set by the client.

___endAddress.description: The ending address for this route. If the start address is specified in CIDR notation, this must be omitted.

___startAddress.description: The starting address for this route. This may also include a CIDR notation, in which case the end address must not be specified.

___routeType.description:
The type of route this is:
 DEFAULT - By default, every app has routes to the local address ranges specified by RFC1918
 INHERITED - Routes inherited from the real Virtual Network routes
 STATIC - Static route set on the app only
 
 These values will be used for syncing an app's routes with those from a Virtual Network.

___name.description: Name for the App Service plan.

___hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for the App Service Environment to use for the App Service plan.

___workerTierName.description: Target worker tier assigned to the App Service plan.

___perSiteScaling.description: If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently. If false, apps assigned to this App Service plan will scale to all instances of the plan.

$eref.description: Description of a SKU for a scalable resource.

___capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource.

___skuCapacity.description: Min, max, and default scale values of the SKU.

___capabilities.description: Capabilities of the SKU, e.g., is traffic manager enabled?

___size.description: Size specifier of the resource SKU.

___tier.description: Service tier of the resource SKU.

___family.description: Family code of the resource SKU.

___location.description: Location of the App Service Environment, e.g. "West US".

___ipsslAddressCount.description: Number of IP SSL addresses reserved for the App Service Environment.

___dynamicCacheEnabled.description:
True/false indicating whether the App Service Environment is suspended. The environment can be suspended e.g. when the management endpoint is no longer available
 (most likely because NSG blocked the incoming traffic).

___apiManagementAccountId.description: API Management Account associated with the App Service Environment.

___clusterSettings.description: Custom settings for changing the behavior of the App Service Environment.

___vnetResourceGroupName.description: Resource group of the Virtual Network.

___kind.description: Kind of the app service environment

___workerPools.description: Description of worker pools with worker size IDs, VM sizes, and number of workers in each pool.

___dnsSuffix.description: DNS suffix of the App Service Environment.

___vnetName.description: Name of the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment.

___name.description: Name of the App Service Environment.

___internalLoadBalancingMode.description: Specifies which endpoints to serve internally in the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment.

___networkAccessControlList.description: Access control list for controlling traffic to the App Service Environment.

___suspended.description: true if the App Service Environment is suspended; otherwise, false. The environment can be suspended, e.g. when the management endpoint is no longer available (most likely because NSG blocked the incoming traffic).

___workerCount.description: Number of instances in the worker pool.

___workerSizeId.description: Worker size ID for referencing this worker pool.

___workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances.

___workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances.
